Articles.Content:
Hi people ! i have modded ksp and like it, this game is... whaouh ! ^^ 

buuut :s, i have the part docking ports "apas" and i have make a mun station with "apas" lfo4, or similirar, and after, i have make a new module for my station with a "apas" lfo4 and when im front of my station, really front of the docking port target, nothing act ! 

I have all try, rotation, more speed, - speed, seriously ^^ im so dégouter ( disapointed ), but i can read on the apas : "Statut locked", oh may be this is just that and no all the bug when i have read on internet about the apas  

You know a button for unlock ? i dont know if im clear in my text, im french and your strange and old language is hard for me  

In finaly, in the Vab, when i make the module for my station i have make :  the engine / stack decoupler / probes (automatic rocket ? ^^ ) / !!APAS !!/ fuel and monop and solar panel for the station / APAS

maybe the apas of the middle make bug ? this is an apas with an other and in space i can "unlock" but i can't lock after ^^' same problemes of the apas on the top with the station's apas... lot of apas in this story...

 

Thank you guys and i stay no high for read your answers

ok, i have understand one thing, the APAS lfo4 active work with an APAS passive, with it an magnetic effect between my module, the more little follow the big, but nothing is "joint" just magnetic fields, i cant transfer crew and if i move the magnetic field is brocken...

And i can extend the lfo4, during this statut began "moving" when is finish : "locked" again, what for ?

 

EDIT: i have win with the apas 69 / apas 69 ^^ the docking is esay with it, and the link really hard ! good, i continued my test on the ground ^^

Edited June 30, 2016 by Le Français
